attributes.action: ensure road repairs in essex are done properly not patched
attributes.additional_details: our roads are in a  such a state it looks as if we have been bombed and they are not being repaired the right way patching them is not good enough as soon as this is done it all comes out again this is a complete waste of tax payers money. YOU should insure they are inspected afterwards our safety is your reponsability

rejection.details: This is a matter for Essex County Council.
